Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: sheltercat
Reviews.Content: **UPDATE** - I'm updating this only to say that my brother-in-law, who bought this same TV at the same time I did, just had his die as well.  Same issue, it would not turn on anymore.  His lasted longer than mine only because it was rarely used.  In terms of hours turned on, they were probably about the same.  This company makes TERRIBLE products and DOES NOT stand behind them.I got this TV in a Black Friday sale, for $250.  That was, what, 6 weeks ago?  And it has already died.  It will not power on anymore.  Total waste of money!  It was nice while it lasted; picture was good, sound was OK (not great).  I have since found a load of complaints online about this company's awful customer service and their refusal to fix their TV's or refund your money.  I'm chalking this up to a learning experience and doing better research before I buy my next TV.  I will never buy another Coby product again.

Reviews.Title: COBY - Color? Operational? Bargain? Yeah...about that...
Reviews.Author: Jon Shai "Just a guy"
Reviews.Content: Like many others, bought this on Black Friday 2011. It worked for roughly 100 days, just enough to get it out of the 90 day warranty period.Worked is relative though, the screen was quite bright...uncomfortably so in a darkened room. The color was over-saturated and no amount of fiddling with the the settings would make them comfortable for regular movies. It makes cartoons look quite vibrant however, so maybe for a play room?The sound was mediocre on a good day.The best thing I can say about this unit is that the remote worked longer than the TV did without having to change the batteries once!I'm working with Visa to try and get some of my money back through the extended warranty benefit on the credit card, but the documentation required is reliant on first finding someone who can provide a written estimate on repairing a Coby...not having much luck with that either.If the negative reviews don't scare you off from buying the TV, try calling a few repair shops and letting them laugh when you ask about repairing anything Coby and see if that helps you reconsider.You've been warned.

Reviews.Title: very poor
Reviews.Author: Irish
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV on black friday.  Lasted 3 weeks and then no picture but sound fine. Total waste of money and would never again buy a Coby TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV at this Price, Size and Resolution
Reviews.Author: M. Bennett "ttennebkarm"
Reviews.Content: Gave this as a gift and the recipient was VERY pleased, and still gives glowing reports of the set.Given my budget I was afraid I was going to have to settle for a 32" or 720p set, so was very pleased to find this one.I was a little hesitant given the price.At that time there weren't so many negative reviews.  I certainly respect those reviewers who got defective units, and I hope they got some action to resolve it.  All I can say is that the particular unit we got has been doing fine for 3 months, and made the owner VERY HAPPY.I think it's important to get 1080p in these larger screen sizes.  Perhaps an audio or videophile would want a higher end set.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: jadechessink
Reviews.Content: this is a very good hdtv, it has a vga input, 3 hdmi inputs, a component, and a composite input. the picture quality is 1080p, no glare, doesnt run too hot, and its cheap. i was contemplating on whether or not i should give it 5 stars and i decided to, my only complaint is that fact that it has a digital audio out, and not an analog, but i gave it 5 cause i might as well get a new reciever.*UPDATE*so i felt the need to tell people that i bought this on black friday, and that it still works. WELL for that matter, its still as amazing as the day i got it, i have had no problems with it at all, it does have a high pitched whine while in standby, but that is simply cause 99% of the population have no clue about electronics or saving money/energy. here are some tips:1. dont leave your tv on 24/72. get it an uninterruptable power supply! any high power complex electronic device can get damaged from spontaneously losing power! if you want best results, get a pure sine wave UPS, if not then get a regular one (they give out square waves). if you dont feel like getting either of those then ATLEAST add a surge protector.3. tv's are constantly using energy, so unless you add a surge protector and turn it off then its still going to be using energy. so keep it turned off whenever you are not using it.4. tv's get hot. they need proper cooling. just like computers, they have processors inside of them so they do get hot, so to prolong tv life add a fan or something.5. just dont expect such a cheap tv to be the most amazing tv in the world...

Reviews.Title: Not the great sound as reviewed but very nice picture
Reviews.Author: Robbo
Reviews.Content: I was influenced by the review that said the sound was great. It isn't. Actually very poor. What has struck me is the great picture! Not the great sound as reviewed but very nice picture. Hope this helps future buyers.PS: be careful of extreme shipping fee's.

Reviews.Title: great deal!
Reviews.Author: Shelby
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my bedroom. Its such a great price and looks amazing. I read some of the reviews on it that there is a problem with sound? But I think it gets super loud.I don't even have to turn it up even halfway.I'm very happy with my purchase and made it to my house 2 days after I ordered it.

Reviews.Title: don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: becky
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money.  Worst life of any TV I've ever owned.  Worked fine one day, next morning it's dead.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY COBY
Reviews.Author: SMv "SMV"
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought my daughter a COBY 40 inch flat screen tv, model TFTV4025, for roughly $349.00 in April to replace another tv that we had purchased for her for Christmas that was having some issues with lines in the screen. We did an exchange for this TV brand instead.  Just had this tv barely over 90 days and now the tv will not come one.  Was working fine, turned it off and hour later went to turn it on and only the power light indicator would come on in the corner when using the remote.  Same thing when tried to turn it on at the TV itself.  Just a black screen, will not come one at all now, no power indicator light either.  No will replace it or look at it, I am out $350.00!!!!  Did a search and see that I am not the only one with the same problem, I have found the same review after review, all stating the same problem. I will never buy another COBY anything!  BEWARE!

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: drew010588
Reviews.Content: The tv didn't work when i got it. i called coby and they said i got a defective model. i contacted the seller and they are paying for the return shipping and refunding our account. coby is a really awful brand and their stuff breaks literally all the time. it's crazy that they're even still in business.

Reviews.Title: Great while it lasted...
Reviews.Author: Sarah Anderson
Reviews.Content: Purchased June 2012 and in September 2012 after being off all night, no picture or sound but standby and power light works. Coby wouldn't replace it and said that it was up to the store I purchase it from. Even though we bought a warranty. we ended up keeping the TV but still purchased a new one (not a Coby). We just had the TV fixed yesterday (motherboard replaced) and literally 3 hours after having it fixed we have the same issue.Their products are made cheap, their customer service sucks, and they don't follow through with anything they say. DO NOT BUY A COBY ANYTHING! I'm sure maybe a few out of the bunch will work correctly, but your chance is just as good as playing the powerball.

Reviews.Title: Worked while it lasted
Reviews.Author: strz210
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV on sale around SuperBowl time. Had decent quality, and never gave us trouble. Less than a year later, I'm watching just regular nightly tv, and it just shuts off. Wouldn't turn back on, would light up, but then shut right back off. Had a burnt plastic smell too. It was my electric either because nothing was hot, nothing sparked, and nothing shorted. The smell was coming right from the tv. Do yourself a favor and just buy a different one.

Reviews.Title: I Wish
Reviews.Author: mcta1
Reviews.Content: First let me say the picture quality is  ok . The audio could be better.The major problem is the connections on the back for some reason they have put them in a vertical position too close together and very, very difficult to attach anything to them.The remote control is very cheaply made and must be positioned exactly in the right position for it to function.I only wish that I had not waited a few days too long to return this TV.I would NOT recommend this TV to anyone

Reviews.Title: Worth less than I paid, and I didn't pay much
Reviews.Author: C. Woods "Sandalfoot Kid"
Reviews.Content: I didn't pay very much, I actually got a great bargain at $344 dollars due to some promotions.  This TV has a good picture, decent sound, and while the stand is a little peculiar, the TV as a whole was good enough for a 40 inch TV.  What I noticed right away is that the TV would sometimes just freeze and not allow you to turn it on.  It would be unresponsive to the remote to turn the volume up and down and would have to have the power reset.  Five months of use, and now, the sound will just cut off in a program and I will have to turn it on and then off again.  The problem is not a consistent one, it just comes and goes.  Not exactly what I expected.  I have used Coby radio and small dvd players with screens with no problems.  This TV...not as desirable as the price was.  Afterwards, I found customer service is terribly hard to contact, and I have not had the problem fixed.

Reviews.Title: Don't Waste your $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$
Reviews.Author: Nona K. Wendland "MISTY'S MOM"
Reviews.Content: Worst TV ever!  It makes a weird high pitch buzing noise when it is off.  Now it won't turn on, but still makes the annoying buzing noise.  So frustrated.

Reviews.Title: Really?
Reviews.Author: landshark
Reviews.Content: Bought three (3) of these.  Thought they would be a nice bedroom TV.  I was wrong.  ALL 3 had an HDMI fail within 3 months of buying them, and yesterday, after less than a year, ALL THREE failed (won't turn on) within a YEAR of purchase.  There is ZERO customer support, and I am told by the repair tech, who investigated all 3 TV's, spare parts are NOT MADE!Ultimately this is a good disposable TV.  NEVER AGAIN with a COBY product.  Buyer beware.  One really does get what they pay for!

Reviews.Title: WOW!! Amazing!!
Reviews.Author: lvdubn
Reviews.Content: How could any company make a product of such unmatched cheapness!!I Always knew COBY Products were notorious for being cheap made in China garbage, But this TV Takes the cake!! Brand new out of the box worked for 2 days plugged into a Playstation via HDMI.. Now after about 20 minutes the screen goes black, makes a loud static sound then turns off with power light blinking LOL.. Do not buy. Got this TV as a free giveaway, and after reading about it online no way would I buy this TV or any coby tv!!

Reviews.Title: coby tv
Reviews.Author: clarence
Reviews.Content: was not sure about buying a brand i was not familiar with but very happy overall so far,unit works well and has plenty of different style hook up for cable,dvd etc

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Rebel"K" "Karl"
Reviews.Content: What can I say about the Coby 40" HD Tv?  Well it was cheap, and it shows it in both the picture and the sound.  Picture quality is poor, no matter how it is adjusted the picture tends to be off color, and if the scene is dark there are visible spots all over the screen.  The set does not handle dark well.  Sound quality is pretty lousy for this size, and I have had better sound on a 12 inch black and white with mono.  All in all I would not recommend this as a first set in the living room or family room.  It may be adequate for the kids in the play room, but you will be better off to spend a 100 or more and buy a TCL which I had before this one.  There is no USB port, and the rest of the ports are in the back under the cover making it very hard to add anything without pulling the TV out and tipping it over.  If you want a cheap set for the basement or the garage, this is it, but if you want something of quality, good picture and sound, skip this model.  I think I will return it and buy something a little more upscale.

Reviews.Title: Its a waste
Reviews.Author: pena1592
Reviews.Content: Is Waste, image degraded, pour sound, I'm crying. I waste my money. The price of $300 is much for this trash. I'm stupid, please don't pay for that...

Reviews.Title: No way
Reviews.Author: MrsRandle87
Reviews.Content: The tv was very defective. Like new, please as soon as I turned the tv on it was flickering. Also they didn't send a manual or the screws to attach the tv to the base. If I ever buy another tv it will be from a store I can physically go to.

Reviews.Title: Bad service
Reviews.Author: Yvonne
Reviews.Content: I was sold a tv that does work and won't do Nottingham about its a piece of crapI will never shoppe with this place again  I would like my money back.

Reviews.Title: PIECE OF CRAP
Reviews.Author: L. CHAUVIN "twinkielite"
Reviews.Content: My son hates this TV. The sound is awful, never will go lower than a 5 level, the remote doesn't work well, and the sound quality is terrible. Sounds like a tin can. Don't buy.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon is best "Connie"
Reviews.Content: It is not a good visual and the sound is poor for a TV of this brand.. It is supposed to be HD ready... but it does not work for some reason. I still to this day have not been able to use this TV and the sound is horrible.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY COBY!
Reviews.Author: Bobby
Reviews.Content: My TV just stopped working after 1 1/2 years! A reply email from coby just said it is defective return under 90 day warranty!! Nothing else! After reading reviews most people, at least 70% were dissatisfied! They are cheap so if you needs temporary tv gets coby

Reviews.Title: This TV sucks!
Reviews.Author: LEOVIDES
Reviews.Content: If you have plans to put up a home theater, I strongly warn you NOT TO BUY this particular model.  It doesn't have any audio-out jack to extend the audio coming from its own speakers.  You wouldn't be able to enjoy High Definition (HD) movies with poor quality sound coming from its built-in speakers.  All the slot at its back panel are only for input and none for output! I hate it!

Reviews.Title: *broken*
Reviews.Author: rach
Reviews.Content: It arrived quickly but would not work. After getting rid of my old tv, put this new one up and spend quite a while thinking....what am i doing wrong??!! I finally called coby, they said something is wrong with it and we should send it back to amazon. so that's what we did, i can tell you we did not replace it with the same tv. went to target and got a different brand.would never buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Rey Morales
Reviews.Content: I am amazed at how great this tv looks, the picture is nice and sharp right out of the box, vivid colors and deep blacks.  Just amazing for the price, the only thing I had trouble with was getting my computer vga to display on it, but I was able to get it work with a dvi to hdmi adapter.  All in all, I'm very happy with the purchase!

Reviews.Title: Bought for my toddlers
Reviews.Author: Charge
Reviews.Content: tl;dr - Good TV for kids or someone who doesn't care about a quality picture across a large screen.This TV was bought for the sole purpose of being large enough for my kids to stay engaged with the cartoons and cheap enough to justify buying their own tv.I'm not really sure how it gets away with saying its 1080p and what not - I'm not going to lie the picture isnt that great. Especially when watching quality productions like movies or anything other than cartoons or average rated animated content.However I did buy this for $200 brand new, so I couldn't really pass it up. I would never buy this TV for $400 and strongly advise against it. I've only had the TV for 2 weeks and I haven't had any issues with it. It does what it's supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: Coby is no longer in business
Reviews.Author: Vincent C.
Reviews.Content: Coby went out of business in the summer of 2013. Since the company is not in business, it is not in a position to honor a manufacturer's warranty. If a warranty is triggered, a purchaser would likely need to rely on an alternate source for that coverage.

Reviews.Title: The seller is a rip off
Reviews.Author: kay taylor
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a tv that I can afford for about 2 years. I finally decided to turn to amazon after not being able to find what I wanted in a store. I thought I was getting a good deal but when the tv came, the first thing I noticed was that there was no remote. I thought the seller just forgot to include it so I will go out and purchase one. no biggy. I also noticed there was no recipt with seller phone number etc. I really thought it was just an error. After buying 3 remotes and thinking the reason they wouldnt work is because I didnt understand how to program it I started calling in the techs. After 3 consultations they all told me that a little scratch I had seen on the front was actually an indication that the item was broken and it cannot use a remote so return it. When I hunted down and contacted the seller he would not accept the return of the product even though it had a 1 year warranty. I am stuck with a $322 loss. no way out. no way to turn the tv up, change the channel, vol, program etc. I was suckered in. buyer beware.

Reviews.Title: COBY 40" LCD TV and Amazon's suggestions
Reviews.Author: Sue Sanders
Reviews.Content: I bought this Coby tv after checking the sales at other sites, Amazon had a competable price, the tv, has a nice clear picture, this is my first flat screen and I would deffinetly recommend buying from Amazon!! They were very helpful as to what to buy with it and everything set up nicely, The tv is great!!!The HDMI cables are great and the bracket they offer with it was perfect!!

Reviews.Title: Using the tv right now!
Reviews.Author: collegegal
Reviews.Content: I've had the TV for about 5 months and it has been a great experience. The coloring is nice and looks great mounted in my small apartment. My only complaint is that the volume on the Tv is very low but it's not a big deal because we don't use the tv that often.UPDATE: I've had this tv for almost a yr and I've run into more problems.. like it shuts off for no reason and the  volume goes up and down on  its own.

Reviews.Title: new tv
Reviews.Author: frederick lee henderson jr
Reviews.Content: I just got the tv. I am very happy with the price, how quickly I received it and the picture quality is great and also the sound is a lot better than most televisoons too. I had a 47inch before this and this one definitely doesnt look that much smaller, it looks a lot bigger than 40inches. The only negative things I'd say, is the cable jack and the hdmi ports are in a very awkward position on the back of the tv. Made a pain in the neck to hook up the cable.

Reviews.Title: It Works as Should
Reviews.Author: jahvissynaxis
Reviews.Content: So far So GoodIt's only been 3 months since I bought it so I cannot give any guarantees on the life of the product but no problems yet.The only downside is that it takes a while to power on and you find yourself wondering if you did press the power button and then you press it again and it powers off.

Reviews.Title: Another Super Item from Amazon!
Reviews.Author: onemssassy
Reviews.Content: This TV is super in price, super in clarity, super in every way! The delivery was on time. Picture is perfect, sound is perfect. Highly recommend this product to anyone!

Reviews.Title: 40" TV
Reviews.Author: Joy "Joy"
Reviews.Content: It was delivered promptly even before I expected.  Hooked it up, and it works great.  Not even a bobble.  There is one thing tho-- I can't find any audio out jacks.  There is a digital audio out but you need a digital cord for that.  Don't know if the digital will work with an older analog amp to just get a better sound.The summation is that it is a great tv at a reasonable price.  I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT SIZE...sub par speakers
Reviews.Author: puppet
Reviews.Content: The tv is gorgeous, light and thing....however the speakers aren't very good. You can turn it up to it's highest volume and if someone flushes the toilet you'll miss something someone said on whatever you're watching. We use this tv mainly for our bedroom since we don't watch it that often. It is very nice don't get me wrong and when I'm home alone it's perfect for snuggling in bed and watching a movie. Just wish it had better sound.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Big t
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with my purchase. Good picture and sound, great price. I would reccomend this product to anybody looking for a bargain.

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift - better than expected
Reviews.Author: Fish
Reviews.Content: Was a little worried - after some reviews questioned the quality. Bought it as a gift - I wanted to get a TCL (we have one ourselves - and I can't say enough positive things about their product - it's fantastic) but it wasn't available.The picture quality is good. The product works - was easy to setup. Six weeks in - it's working well still. The base isn't super heavy. The bezel is plastic - and looks like it. The on-screen menu isn't beautiful like on an LG, but for $329 - it's not bad at all. It doesn't have the most connectors, but if you need that, you probably aren't buying discount TV's.Ultimately - it works - it's reliable (so far) so it's a great value.

Reviews.Title: satisfaction OK
Reviews.Author: Bud
Reviews.Content: Only had this TV for one month, and so far so good. On high definition stations, it has beautiful color and resolution. I have cable hookup. On the standard digital stations, I feel the definition leaves a lot to be desired. I have two other sets, which are only 19" units, and 720 dpi, but they get very good color and def. on all channels. For $304.00 shipping included, this Coby 40" TV, is a great buy, and my wallet is rather low on the green, or I would have spent two C notes more and got a Samsung, but since the majority of the stations I watch do come in HD, I am very satisfied. As almost everyone else has mentioned, the audio is weak and will not put out much volume. Also there is only a RCA type audio output for external speakers, I was not happy with that, but I bought a $60 RCA 5-1 surround system, and used audio/video cables from the cable converter box and another set of cables from the Blu-Ray to the Sub woofer where all the controls are., and now I have plenty of volume. By the way, RCA's mickey mouse remote is a joke, it does function OK, but its so small, it gets lost so easy. So, unless something goes wrong when the warranty is done, I am very pleased with this Coby flat screen, for the price, its a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the money!
Reviews.Author: A. Mishell "Colorado_Al"
Reviews.Content: So far so good! Arrived in 2 days in perfect condition! Thanks Amazon Prime!Easy setup.I have certainly seen better TVs, but for $300, this one is an awesome buy! I purchased a 3 year Squaretrade warranty for $30. I hope I don't need it but the cost including the 3 year warranty is less than any other TV in this size. It seems like this is a product that many people have great success with, while others have a dead TV in 100 days. I hope that it lasts, but if not, squaretrade 3 year warranty is like gold! In home service for a TV this size and repair or replacement with no deductible. Picture is clear, remote is good. Sound not as good but I was not planning on using the TV speakers. I use the speakers in my stereo system.I like it!!!

Reviews.Title: Cheap TV, expensive lesson.
Reviews.Author: Hammerklavier
Reviews.Content: I purchased the TV at the very end of December, and as of today (June 20th) the picture has died.  The power indicator still flashes when I hit the remote but the screen remains dark, indicating that the LCD panel has failed.  It's a goner.A cursory Google search reveals that this company will either quote you a ridiculous price for out-of-warranty repairs (warranty is only 90 days) or simply give you the run around until it becomes more of a hassle than it's worth.  You could probably hire a lawyer to force the issue, but a decent one will cost you $300 an hour.  You can do the math.I suspect this company makes money by assembling a bare-bones product which is designed only to last through the warranty period.  Once the 90 days are up, you're stuck with whatever you've got.In retrospect, I very much wish that I had paid the extra $150 for a Toshiba/LG/Samsung, or had even opted for a similarly priced 32 inch TV from a reliable brand.  I'd much rather have a smaller TV that's still working today, than be stuck with this large piece of plastic that is essentially trash now.I've learned my lesson, and will never purchase anything from this company again.

Reviews.Title: good TV
Reviews.Author: GERMAN LEAL
Reviews.Content: the product is a good TV for the price. the service was fast and confident. the sound is very bad but it is not the matter, because always is true. thanks

Reviews.Title: Can't complain
Reviews.Author: Von
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about this TV because of the brand but after receiving it all of that went out the window. Its bright but not enough to blind you and it has enough ports in the back to attach practically whatever you'd like. The USB port is useless and I would have liked it to have some sort of capability. Otherwise the TV was easy to set up and it hasn't blew out on me or faded its colors and I couldn't be more satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good deal. Would buy again.
Reviews.Author: nicklong98
Reviews.Content: I just got mine yesterday and so far it's been pretty good. I use it for a monitor and for console gaming. I have a couple issues that prevent me from giving it a 5 star review though.Pros:1) Picture quality is great. I watched a couple game trailers in 1080p and it was amazing2) Really easy to set up. The most difficult part was cleaning off a spot on my desk for it3) Lots of inputs. 3 HDMI, 1 component, 1 AV, 1 coax, and 1 VGACons:1) The sound quality is horrible2) When playing a game where it's dark, it's too dark and turning up the brightness doesn't seem to help as much as it should.3) For PC input, it only has VGA, no DVI ports. You could use HDMI if you wanted to, but no DVI.Overall, I don't regret purchasing it. It's a great deal for the priceEdit:It has now been a couple of months since I purchased this TV. I've adjusted to the darkness on most games and find that it adds to the atmosphere of the types of games I play. I also purchased a sound system, which means that the horrible sound quality on the TV is no longer an issue. I have had 0 issues with it and use it several hours every day. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: great for the money
Reviews.Author: bailey
Reviews.Content: we received one of these televisions for Christmas from our kids and it has worked great so we purchases another one as a door prize for a fundraiser we were having

Reviews.Title: Only last 3 months
Reviews.Author: Chelsea Massingille
Reviews.Content: While it lasted it was a nice tv I thought I was getting a steal but 3 months later the screen won't turn on but I can hear a little bit of sound if I stick my ear up to :/ useless

Reviews.Title: It's alright
Reviews.Author: Colorado
Reviews.Content: Picture is really good but the sound it has is very very low quality it's almost riduculous but if you have a home entertainment or a reciever then you can hook it up to it and not deal with the TV's speakers, then you can be happy with it. And for the low price that I paid well you can't have everything. Buy a home entertainment center with it.

Reviews.Title: Sound Is Terrible -DO-NOT-BUY
Reviews.Author: Candee
Reviews.Content: My First 40inch TV!! I was so ecstatic go a TV past 32inches within my budget HA!!!! I'm so wrong. Picture was mediocre and the sound is so low. I cant take my TV back because its past the 30days even though I am just opening up the box. I plan on buying a Home Theater system to help with the sound. I guess this brand is a hit or miss seeing that some people had no problems with the sound on this model but I will never buy a COBY anything again. I was shocked to learn that the sound was so low. I will stick to the brands I know from now on even if that means spending more than my wallet can handle. DO-NOT BUY-THIS-TV.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Tone Capone
Reviews.Content: I cought this TV on sale for $300 and now it for sale for $450.. THAT ALONE MAKES THIS TV GREAT.

Reviews.Title: missing power cord
Reviews.Author: john stanphill
Reviews.Content: Tv works great.  Was delivered without power cord though. Unfortnately i work overseas and was not able to address this problem. It was a gift and they went out and had to buy a power cord.

Reviews.Title: coby flat screen
Reviews.Author: philosophy5150
Reviews.Content: Its so vivid its definitely the best bang for you buck but like most flat screens the sound is not the greatest but with good the experience so much greater

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Alexander Da Costa
Reviews.Content: Feliz por este televisor, doy gracias a ustedes por presentarme esta oportunidad, apenas lo recibi ayer y estoy muy emosionado, excelente tv coby. Saludos.

Reviews.Title: almost didnt turn on
Reviews.Author: koolher man
Reviews.Content: it made aloud snap noise and wouldnt come on 3 times in a row then it come on thank goodness
